mapper.sql: SELECT pi.pr_no, pi.item_seq, pi.item_nm, pi.item_cd, pi.cls_cd, pi.size_nm, pi.model_nm, pi.dlv_loc, To_date(pi.dlv_req_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlv_req_ymd, pi.mk_comp_nm, pi.unit_cd, pi.qty, pi.plan_unit_prc, pi.rfq_no, pi.po_no, pi.item_st FROM agt_pritem pi
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agt_pritem ( pr_no, item_seq, item_nm, item_cd, cls_cd, size_nm, model_nm, unit_cd, qty, plan_unit_prc, rfq_no, po_no, mk_comp_nm, item_st, dlv_loc, dlv_req_ymd ) SELECT dp.e4u_pr_no, dpi.item_seq, dpi.item_nm, i.item_cd, '999999', dpi.size_nm, dpi.model_nm, dpi.unit_cd, dpi.qty, dpi.plan_unit_prc, NULL, NULL, dpi.mk_comp_nm, '00', dpi.dlv_loc, dpi.dlv_req_ymd FROM agt_dum_pr dp inner join agt_dum_pritem dpi ON ( dpi.erp_pr_no = dp.erp_pr_no ) left join agt_item i ON ( i.erp_item_cd = dpi.erp_item_cd ) WHERE dp.erp_pr_no = #{erpPrNo}

INSERT INTO agt_pritem ( pr_no, item_seq, item_nm, item_cd, cls_cd, size_nm, model_nm, unit_cd, qty, plan_unit_prc, rfq_no, po_no, mk_comp_nm, item_st, dlv_loc, dlv_req_ymd ) VALUES ( #{prNo}, #{itemSeq}, #{itemNm}, #{itemCd}, '999999', #{sizeNm}, #{modelNm}, #{unitCd}, #{qty}, #{planUnitPrc}, NULL, NULL, #{mkCompNm}, '00', #{dlvLoc}, To_char( #{dlvReqYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') )
